data.text: @technollama I am so sorry Andres. Hope that a full recovery is in your near future. Perhaps a photo of a llama will help. https://t.co/iD3sbXl7b2
@achdujeh Yes, long covid is not gone with Omicron by a long shot, and it is still very dangerous. It's just bizarre so many people assuming it's over, it's infuriating.
@technollama Wish you better times!😉 And maybe listen even more to The Cure 🎶📻

@technollama Mild infections caused by Omicron is a bit of a myth, I think. I know a number of people who tested positive more than 10 days and have a long convalescence with ups and downs. Covid 19 remains a dangerous disease for many, despite the vaccinations
@technollama It’s a strange illness. Mine is just inconvenient. I hope you fully recover!
@drgeep Yes, I go through stages, sometimes it's all fine, I've had a couple of bad weeks, and today in particular I feel bad inflammation in my face and arm (I don't know how else to describe it).

@technollama I’m much recovered but things changed. Some things don’t taste how I remember. I’m physically not as fit as I was- get tired more quickly (I play a lot of tennis so notice the drop-off). Memory not what it was. All subtle but I notice a change
@technollama I’m so sorry to hear this
